page.title: 10Tourism in St.Leonard's
page.content: A coastal resort,St.Leonard's has a seasonal influx of Summer visitors. Guest houses and holiday flats abound and there are 2 main holiday centres. The smaller,Hastings Holiday Centre, offers full-board accommodation for around Â£80 per week.At the other,Combe Haven,almost 500 caravans and a smaller number of bungalows,chalets and villas are let for between Â£151 and Â£248 per week (self-catering).286 more caravans are privately owned.The site boasts a range of entertainments and recreational facilities.Many come just for these,but others visit annually because of the attraction of the surrounding area.While St.Leonard's may offer relatively little to the holidaymaker,Brighton, Eastbourne,Rye and the Sussex countryside are easily reached.Many foreign students also visit.
